author: Paul Butzi
content:
I like the tune you suggest.

An alternative:  "Mood Indigo", this version: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LBeu9K2F2vA

Ellington on piano, Armstrong on trumpet and vocals, Barney Bigard on clarinet, Trummy Young on trombone.

Ah, bliss. Blue with a warm note, just like the photo (very nice, by the way).
